thread.title: Dewey & LeBoeuf Case Expected to Go to Jury Soon
thread.title_full: Dewey & LeBoeuf Case Expected to Go to Jury Soon - WSJ

author: Sara Randazzo
title: Dewey & LeBoeuf Case Expected to Go to Jury Soon
text:
Jurors soon will begin deliberating the fate of three former Dewey & LeBoeuf LLP executives, accused of fraudulently propping up the once-storied law firm’s finances in the years ahead of its stunning 2012 collapse.
Prosecutors have made a final bid to convince jurors that Dewey’s ex-chairman, Steven Davis, and former executive director, Stephen DiCarmine, sat atop an alleged scheme to defraud the firm’s banks and creditors. The pair enlisted the third defendant, Dewey’s former chief financial officer, Joel Sanders,...
